article:
Kites are made of thin sticks and paper.Most people have _ a kite ride and dip in a strong spring wind or have flown _ .But not _ many people know that the Chinese were making and flying kites even _ people could write.
A long time ago, the Chinese made kites to _ in wars.They would fly these war kites at night.The kites were fixed so that they made strange sounds.The enemies were frightened _ ran away.They thought those strange sounds were made _ spirits in the sky.
 _ Chinese people also flew kites to bring good luck and to make their crops rich and tall.Sometimes they would fly the kites _ water, pulling the hooks hang down to catch fish.
